original: a yu sid+d+hi pha la hring hring dzahdzahsarba pany+tsha a mr-ita kun+da li hu~m hrihtha/

original: ka ya wa ka tshit+ta sarba sid+d+hi pha la hu~m/
analyzed: ka ya wa ka tshit+ta sarba sid+d+hi pha la

analyzed: hrih zag med d lnga khrug ba rdo rje dbyings

analyzed: deng dir sgrub mchog gdung ba bod lags so

analyzed: d gsal rig dzin rgyal ba jal yas nas

analyzed: jam dpal bshes gnyen na gardzu na dang hu~m kar bi ma pra chen hasti la

analyzed: gdung ba bod lags brtshe ba dgongs te gshegs

analyzed: jam dpal sku dang pad+ma gsung gi lha

analyzed: phrin las phur ba ma mo rbod gtong gis

analyzed: mthu stobs mchog thun dngos grub dir stshol cig

analyzed: snang ba mtha yas chos sku gyur med bcud

analyzed: pad+ma badzra bud+d+ha thod phreng rtshal
